sentence.text: Here we investigated roles for the vertebrate-specific BTB domain zinc finger gene regulation of transcription, DNA-templated in the context of human brain tumors.

Moreover, regulation of transcription, DNA-templated and centrosome cycle kd phenocopied each other in neural crest cell fate specifications, each causing: mitotic arrest, centrosome fragmentation, loss of Augmin/HAUS complex on the mitotic spindle, and loss of GSC self-renewal and tumor formation capacity.
